name: Michael John Isip
about: A weeb, baller, and a software development enthusiast.
description: An ambivert who loves sports especially basketball and athletics. I spent most of my primary and secondary days training for competitions to be a scholar on schools I attended. Then one day, I discovered my love for programming back in highschool when we were tasked to develop a banking system as our school project. Since then, I pursued on improving and exploring the field of software development.

projects.name: LVCC Enrollment System
projects.description: The project served as our capstone project during my senior year in college. I was tasked to develop the admin side of the project which consists of different functionalities and modules.

projects.name: Google Yellow Pages System
projects.description: A project which lists nearest landmarks based on a searched address. Cancelled due to Google APIs limitations.

projects.name: DashSMS
projects.description: A Shopify Application for tracking customer cart abandonments and notification system.

projects.name: Authenticart
projects.description: A Shopify Application that promises to improve conversions and lower Return-to-Sender rate.

projects.name: Azimuth
projects.description: An online examination system for Marine Engineering students of the client.

projects.name: Booble
projects.description: An adult web application in Australia.

projects.name: GC Trader
projects.description: An ecommerce web application in Australia with job posts and communities to join.
